episode_summary: This episode of 'No Such Thing As A Fish' features a compilation of humorous and intriguing facts from the hosts' tour, including anecdotes about historical figures, quirky inventions, and unusual scientific studies. The hosts share a variety of amusing stories and facts, ranging from the peculiarities of animal behavior to the oddities of human history and culture.
